'''Gwyon Ironhoof''' was the king of the [[centaur]]s of [[Evermeet]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.History:
In his youth, Gwyon fought in [[Faer√ªn]] together with the [[Mindulgulph Mercenary Company]].

In old age, he settled as a king in Evermeet but soon became bored of the peace of that kingdom and hoped to one day go back to Faerun as an agent of Queen [[Amlaruil Moonflower]], but was too proud to ask her permission.
document_data.Personality: Gwyon was a loyal and wise leader. He kept secret his wanderlust.
document_data.Relationship: Gwyon had good dealings with the [[elf]] queen Amlaruil.
